long_description: The Aqua Sphere Seal 2.0 swim mask provides great visibility to help you sight your line whether you're doing laps in the pool or competing in an open-water race. Durable resin lenses have an antifog and scratch-resistant coating; lenses provide 100% UVA and UVB protection. Leak-resistant silicone skirt around the lenses distributes pressure and prevents water from getting in; skirt provides extra coverage to keep cold water off your face. Lenses provide 180deg of visibility; clear lenses work especially well indoors or on overcast days outdoors. Silicone strap endures regular use. The Aqua Sphere Seal 2.0 swim mask includes a hard plastic case.
short_description: The Aqua Sphere Seal 2.0 swim mask provides great visibility to help you sight your line whether you're doing laps in the pool or competing in an open-water race.
